justification: "To measure strategic behavior in social contexts, we used the Dictator Game (DG; [12])…"
"To measure strategic behavior in social contexts, we used the … Ultimatum Game (UG; [13])."
"Shared Reward Task… we measured the responses associated with winning or losing money contingent on the social context of partner type."
construct: shared reward processing in social contexts

justification: "…preserving our ability to directly contrast responses associated with social and nonsocial reward."
"Reaction time serves as a proxy for motivational impact of these distinct incentive conditions."

measured_by: Inclusion of Other in Self scale
justification: "…we are missing Inclusion of Other in Self data for the stranger condition… limits some analyses that seek to compare relative closeness between friends and strangers."
